item.title: Were exactly would i put in a public boolean process() {?
item.dc:creator: @yurmoma1023 yurmoma1023
item.description:
@yurmoma1023 wrote:

i have a project czar base source and i am working on the d bow, now were would i add oone of these because theres none in the sourceâ€¦
well theres one but its commented

[code]case 121:
// we could use this to make the char appear for other players only until
// this guys loading is done. Also wait with regular player updates
// until we receive this command.
//public boolean process() {// is being called regularily every 500ms

								writePlayers();
			NewObjects();
			Deleteobjects();
			Deletewalls();
                    	OBJECTS();
			println_debug("Loading finished.");
			break;[/code]

and when i un commented it i got 33 errors compiling lol
